ModMetaData.name: Smoothies
ModMetaData.author: EnderNyktos
ModMetaData.description:
Welcome,
This mod adds three beverages, that can be made in early game. The principal use of this mod is milk, so you need some cows. It takes one point more on cooking skill to make the bulk recipes.
[h3]Warm milk[/h3]
Take it before sleep, it will boost your sleep rate by 30% (similar to "quick sleeper" trait which is 50%).
[h3]Chocomilk smoothie[/h3]
Similar behaviour to the vanilla Chocolate, using 4 chocolates you gain recreation by 40%. Drinking one Chocomilk smoothie will fulfill recreation by 80%.
[h3]Berries smoothie[/h3]
It's a recipe's delicacy from glitterworld. It has a very high nutritive valor and count as Lavish meal boosting your colonist mood.
